David Cameron has repeatedly defended Andy Coulson , one of his inner circle, and on Friday defended his own judgment in hiring him after his resignation from the News of the World. I feel that he's been punished twice for the same offence. I chose to judge him by the work that he's done for me, for the government and for the country, David Cameron said. Opposition leader Ed Miliband said his Labour Party had been proved right to question Andy Coulson 's position. and the Philadelphia 76ers keep winning. One night after a 41-point effort in Philadelphia's most lopsided win of the season, Allen Iverson scored an NBA season-high and career-best 54 in a 107-103 victory over the Cleveland Cavaliers. It was like he was playing horse tonight, said 76ers guard Aaron McKie , who had 20 points and nine assists. "His jumper was deadly."
